description: Unique Data dashboard, display the master objects and bytes consumed at both cluster level and each namespace in the cluster

panels.description: Display Unique Data Utilization across all cluster and namespaces connected to this prometheus instance

targets.expr:
(sum( # Running individual exporter for each node in a cluster
    (avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_ns_cluster_size {job="$job_name", } ))
    == bool 
    (count by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_ns_cluster_size {job="$job_name", } ))
)> bool 0)
* # migration check with RX metric
(sum((sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_migrate_rx_partitions_remaining + aerospike_namespace_migrate_tx_partitions_remaining) != bool 0))
== bool 0)
* # Consistent Effective Replication factor across all nodes
(sum(
    min by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name", }) 
    == bool 
    max by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name", })
) > bool 0)
sum (aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name", })

panels.title: All Cluster - Master Objects (total)

panels.description: Display Unique Data Utilization across all  cluster and namespaces connected to this prometheus instance

targets.expr:
(sum( # Running individual exporter for each node in a cluster
    (avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_ns_cluster_size {job="$job_name",  } ))
    == bool 
    (count by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_ns_cluster_size {job="$job_name",  } ))
)> bool 0)
* # migration check with RX metric
(sum((sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_migrate_rx_partitions_remaining + aerospike_namespace_migrate_tx_partitions_remaining) != bool 0))
== bool 0)
* # Consistent Effective Replication factor across all nodes
(sum(
    min by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name",  }) 
    == bool 
    max by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name",  })
) > bool 0)

(sum((sum((sum ( (((aerospike_namespace_memory_used_data_bytes {job="$job_name",  } + aerospike_namespace_memory_used_index_bytes {job="$job_name",  })
unless # we pick namespace which are in memory but not using Disk or Pmem
(aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes {job="$job_name",  } or aerospike_namespace_pmem_used_bytes {job="$job_name",  } )
) 
/aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name",  }
) 
- on (job, cluster_name, instance, service,ns) ( # begin calculate the header byte size 39bytes if as-version>=6 and 34 if as-version<6
   sum (
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name",  } * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^4.*"}*35) 
      or
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name",  } * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) (
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^5.*"}*35) 
      or
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name",  } * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build!~"^5.*"}*39) ) 
   by (job, cluster_name, instance, service,ns) 
  ) # end of header-byte calculation by aerospike version
) by (service, ns)) or vector(0) ) by (ns))) 
+ on (job, cluster_name, instance, service,ns)
sum (
  ( # device-used-bytes + pmem-used-bytes
    ( # sum disk device used bytes
      ( sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes{job="$job_name",  }) /
      ( sum by (ns) ( (aerospike_namespace_device_compression_ratio{job="$job_name",  } )) 
      *
      avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name",  } ))
    )
  or
    ( sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes{job="$job_name",  }) /
    ( avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name",  } ))
  )
) # end devide-used-bytes
or
( 
    ( sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_pmem_used_bytes{job="$job_name",  }) /
    ( sum by (ns) ( (aerospike_namespace_pmem_compression_ratio{job="$job_name",  } ))  
      * avg by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name",  }) ))
or
    ( sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_pmem_used_bytes{job="$job_name",  }) /
    ( avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name",  }) ))     
)
)
- on (job, cluster_name, instance, service,ns) ( # begin calculate the header byte size 39bytes if as-version>=6 and 34 if as-version<6
   sum (
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name",  } * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) (
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^4.*"}*35) 
      or
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name",  } * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^5.*"}*35) 
      or
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name",  } * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) (
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build!~"^5.*"}*39) ) 
   by (ns)
) # end of header-byte calculation by aerospike version
or vector(0)) # end of disk+pmem used bytes

) # end paranthesis for whole sum

panels.title: All Clusters - Unique Data Bytes (total)

panels.description: Display Unique Data Utilization across all  cluster and namespaces connected to this prometheus instance

targets.expr:
(sum( # Running individual exporter for each node in a cluster
    (avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_ns_cluster_size {job="$job_name",  } ))
    == bool 
    (count by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_ns_cluster_size {job="$job_name",  } ))
)> bool 0)
* # migration check with RX metric
(sum((sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_migrate_rx_partitions_remaining + aerospike_namespace_migrate_tx_partitions_remaining) != bool 0))
== bool 0)
* # Consistent Effective Replication factor across all nodes
(sum(
    min by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name",  }) 
    == bool 
    max by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name",  })
) > bool 0)

(sum by (cluster_name,) ((sum((sum ( (((aerospike_namespace_memory_used_data_bytes {job="$job_name",  } + aerospike_namespace_memory_used_index_bytes {job="$job_name",  })
unless # we pick namespace which are in memory but not using Disk or Pmem
(aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes {job="$job_name",  } or aerospike_namespace_pmem_used_bytes {job="$job_name",  } )
) 
/aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name",  }
) 
- on (job, cluster_name, instance, service,ns) ( # begin calculate the header byte size 39bytes if as-version>=6 and 34 if as-version<6
   sum (
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name",  } * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^4.*"}*35) 
      or
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name",  } * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) (
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^5.*"}*35) 
      or
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name",  } * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build!~"^5.*"}*39) ) 
   by (job, cluster_name, instance, service,ns) 
  ) # end of header-byte calculation by aerospike version
) by (cluster_name, ns)) or on() vector(0) ) by ( cluster_name))) 
+ on (job, cluster_name, instance, service,ns)
sum by (cluster_name,) (
  ( # device-used-bytes + pmem-used-bytes
    ( # sum disk device used bytes
      ( sum by (cluster_name,ns) (aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes{job="$job_name",  }) /
      ( sum by (cluster_name,ns) ( (aerospike_namespace_device_compression_ratio{job="$job_name",  } )) 
      *
      avg by (cluster_name,ns) ( aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name",  } ))
    )
  or
    ( sum by (cluster_name,ns) (aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes{job="$job_name",  }) /
    ( avg by (cluster_name,ns) ( aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name",  } ))
  )
) # end devide-used-bytes
or
( 
    ( sum by (cluster_name,ns) (aerospike_namespace_pmem_used_bytes{job="$job_name",  }) /
    ( sum by (cluster_name, ns) ( (aerospike_namespace_pmem_compression_ratio{job="$job_name",  } ))  
      * avg by (cluster_name,ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name",  }) ))
or
    ( sum by (cluster_name,ns) (aerospike_namespace_pmem_used_bytes{job="$job_name",  }) /
    ( avg by (cluster_name,ns) ( aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name",  }) ))     
)
)
- on (job, cluster_name, instance, service,ns) ( # begin calculate the header byte size 39bytes if as-version>=6 and 34 if as-version<6
   sum (
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name",  } * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) (
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^4.*"}*35) 
      or
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name",  } * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^5.*"}*35) 
      or
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name",  } * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) (
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build!~"^5.*"}*39) ) 
   by (cluster_name, ns)
) # end of header-byte calculation by aerospike version
or on() vector(0)) # end of disk+pmem used bytes

) # end paranthesis for whole sum

panels.title: Clusters wise - Historical - Usage Bytes

panels.description: Display Unique Data Utilization across all  namespaces

targets.expr:
(sum( # Running individual exporter for each node in a cluster
    (avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_ns_cluster_size {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster",  } ))
    == bool 
    (count by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_ns_cluster_size {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster",  } ))
)> bool 0)
* # migration check with RX metric
(sum((sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_migrate_rx_partitions_remaining + aerospike_namespace_migrate_tx_partitions_remaining) != bool 0))
== bool 0)
* # Consistent Effective Replication factor across all nodes
(sum(
    min by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster",  }) 
    == bool 
    max by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster",  })
) > bool 0)
sum (aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster",  })

panels.title: Cluster - All Master Objects

panels.description: Display Unique Data Utilization across all  namespaces

targets.expr:

)> bool 0)
* # migration check with RX metric

== bool 0)

    == bool 
    max by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", })
) > bool 0)

(sum((sum((sum ( (((aerospike_namespace_memory_used_data_bytes {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster",  } + aerospike_namespace_memory_used_index_bytes {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster",  })
unless # we pick namespace which are in memory but not using Disk or Pmem
(aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster",  } or aerospike_namespace_pmem_used_bytes {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster",  } )
) 
/aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster",  }
) 
- on (job, cluster_name, instance, service,ns) ( # begin calculate the header byte size 39bytes if as-version>=6 and 34 if as-version<6
   sum (
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster",  } * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^4.*"}*35) 
      or
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster",  } * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) (
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^5.*"}*35)

   by (job, cluster_name, instance, service,ns) 
  ) # end of header-byte calculation by aerospike version
) by (service, ns)) or vector(0) ) by (ns))) 
+ on (job, cluster_name, instance, service,ns)
sum (
  ( # device-used-bytes + pmem-used-bytes
    ( # sum disk device used bytes
      ( sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster",  }) /
      ( sum by (ns) ( (aerospike_namespace_device_compression_ratio{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster",  } )) 
      *
      avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster",  } ))
    )
  or
    ( sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster",  }) /
    ( avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", } ))
  )
) # end devide-used-bytes
or
( 
    ( sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_pmem_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", }) /
    ( sum by (ns) ( (aerospike_namespace_pmem_compression_ratio{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster",  } ))  
      * avg by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", }) ))
or
    ( sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_pmem_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster",  }) /
    ( avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster",  }) ))     
)
)
- on (job, cluster_name, instance, service,ns) ( # begin calculate the header byte size 39bytes if as-version>=6 and 34 if as-version<6
   sum (
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", } * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) (
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^4.*"}*35) 
      or
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", } * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^5.*"}*35) 
      or
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", } * on (job, cluster_name, service)

        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build!~"^5.*"}*39) ) 
   by (ns)
) # end of header-byte calculation by aerospike version
or vector(0)) # end of disk+pmem used bytes

) # end paranthesis for whole sum

panels.title: Cluster - Unique Data Bytes

panels.description: Display Unique Data Utilization across all  namespaces

targets.expr:
(sum( # Running individual exporter for each node in a cluster
    (avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_ns_cluster_size {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", } ))
    == bool 
    (count by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_ns_cluster_size {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", } ))
)> bool 0)
* # migration check with RX metric
(sum((sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_migrate_rx_partitions_remaining + aerospike_namespace_migrate_tx_partitions_remaining) != bool 0))
== bool 0)
* # Consistent Effective Replication factor across all nodes
(sum(
    min by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", }) 
    == bool 
    max by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", })
) > bool 0)

(sum((sum((sum ( (((aerospike_namespace_memory_used_data_bytes {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", } + aerospike_namespace_memory_used_index_bytes {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", })
unless # we pick namespace which are in memory but not using Disk or Pmem
(aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", } or aerospike_namespace_pmem_used_bytes {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", } )
) 
/aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", }
) 
- on (job, cluster_name, instance, service,ns) ( # begin calculate the header byte size 39bytes if as-version>=6 and 34 if as-version<6
   sum (
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", } * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^4.*"}*35) 
      or
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", } * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) (
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^5.*"}*35) 
      or
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", } * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build!~"^5.*"}*39) ) 
   by (job, cluster_name, instance, service,ns) 
  ) # end of header-byte calculation by aerospike version
) by (service, ns)) or vector(0) ) by (ns))) 
+ on (job, cluster_name, instance, service,ns)
sum (
  ( # device-used-bytes + pmem-used-bytes
    ( # sum disk device used bytes
      ( sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", }) /
      ( sum by (ns) ( (aerospike_namespace_device_compression_ratio{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", } )) 
      *
      avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", } ))
    )
  or
    ( sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", }) /
    ( avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", } ))
  )
) # end devide-used-bytes
or
( 
    ( sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_pmem_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", }) /
    ( sum by (ns) ( (aerospike_namespace_pmem_compression_ratio{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", } ))  
      * avg by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", }) ))
or
    ( sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_pmem_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", }) /
    ( avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", }) ))     
)
)
- on (job, cluster_name, instance, service,ns) ( # begin calculate the header byte size 39bytes if as-version>=6 and 34 if as-version<6
   sum (
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", } * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) (
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^4.*"}*35) 
      or
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", } * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^5.*"}*35) 
      or

        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build!~"^5.*"}*39) ) 
   by (ns)
) # end of header-byte calculation by aerospike version
or vector(0)) # end of disk+pmem used bytes

) # end paranthesis for whole sum

panels.title: Historical - Usage Bytes

panels.description: Display Unique Data Utilization by namespaces in bytes

targets.expr: (sum (aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}) by (ns) )

# above query should work only if the below condition satisfy
(sum( # Running individual exporter for each node in a cluster
    (avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_ns_cluster_size {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster",  ns=~"$namespace|$^"}))
    == bool 
    (count by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_ns_cluster_size {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} ))
) by (ns)> bool 0)
* # migration check with RX + TX metric - for each Namespace
(
    (sum (aerospike_namespace_migrate_rx_partitions_remaining {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster",  ns=~"$namespace|$^"}+ aerospike_namespace_migrate_tx_partitions_remaining {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster",  ns=~"$namespace|$^"}) 
by (ns) == bool 0)
)
* # Consistent Effective Replication factor across all nodes
(sum(
    min by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster",  ns=~"$namespace|$^"}) 
    == bool 
    max by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster",  ns=~"$namespace|$^"})
) by (ns) > bool 0)

((
 (sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} / aerospike_namespace_device_compression_ratio{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster",  ns=~"$namespace|$^"})
 ) /
(avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}))
OR
 (sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} )
 ) /
(avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}))
)- on (job, cluster_name, instance, service,ns)  ( # begin calculate the header byte size 39bytes if as-version>=6 and 34 if as-version<6
   sum (
    aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
    group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^4.*"}*35) !=0
    or
    aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
    group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^5.*"}*35) !=0
    or
    aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
    group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^6.*"}*39) !=0) by (ns)
   ) # end calculation of header-byte by server-version
)

((
 (sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_pmem_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster",  ns=~"$namespace|$^"} / aerospike_namespace_pmem_compression_ratio{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})
 ) /
(avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}))
OR
 (sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_pmem_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} )
 ) /
(avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}))
)- on (job, cluster_name, instance, service,ns) ( # begin calculate the header byte size 39bytes if as-version>=6 and 34 if as-version<6
   sum (
    aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
    group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^4.*"}*35) !=0
    or
    aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
    group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^5.*"}*35) !=0
    or
    aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
    group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^6.*"}*39) !=0) by (ns)
   ) # end calculation of header-byte by server-version
)

((sum((sum ( ((((aerospike_namespace_memory_used_data_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster",  ns=~"$namespace|$^"} + aerospike_namespace_memory_used_index_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})  )
unless # We pick up namespace which use memory, but not Disk or Pmem
(aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} or aerospike_namespace_pmem_used_bytes {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})
) 
/aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}
) 
- on (job, cluster_name, instance, service,ns) 
  ( # calculate the header byte size 39bytes if as-version>=6 and 34 if as-version<6
  sum (
    aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
    group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^4.*"}*35) 
    or
    aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
    group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^5.*"}*35) 
    or
    aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
    group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build!~"^5.*"}*39) ) 
  by (job, cluster_name, instance, service,ns)
  ) 
) by (service, ns)) ) by (ns))
)
